snippet: Thousands of undocumented refugees, immigrants and Kenyan citizens have been arrested, with a sprawling stadium in Nairobi turned into a police station to hold large numbers of them.
abstract: Thousands of undocumented refugees, immigrants and Kenyan citizens have been arrested throughout the country in response to what the government says has been an escalation in terrorist activity; Kasarani stadium in the capital Nairobi has been turned into a police station where hundreds of suspects have been held, visible reminder of the scale of the campaign.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of undocumented refugees, immigrants and Kenyan citizens have been arrested, with a sprawling stadium in Nairobi turned into a police station to hold large numbers of them.

headline.main: Kenya’s Wide Net Against Terror Sweeps Up Refugees
headline.print_headline: Kenya’s Wide Net Against Terror Sweeps Up Refugees
